name: Distortion: The Lost Tapes
description:
Plot:

Welcome to The Elysium Project! A top secret government funded research which hopes to answer one of the most sought after questions: Can you live forever?

From the darkened corridors adorned with the lovely entrails of the staff, to the decrepit pits where only the worst of abominations are kept, this little adventure will have you traversing the inner bowels of the secret research facility laying below Washington. Learn the secrets of the project and try your best to avoid the "Regressions" as they lay siege to the facility, armed with the knowledge of the inhumane experimentations, it's up to you to release the information about the project to the public before it's too late..

Features:

A extensive save/loading system to pick up your progress

4 slow paced atmospheric levels to survive

A deeply unnerving soundtrack

Minimalist HUD design for added Immersion
